q1: How do I save the invoice as PDF?
a1: Click the Print button and choose "Save as PDF" in your browser's print dialog.
a2: We support USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, CAD, AUD, CHF, CNY, INR, and BRL.
q3: Can I add tax to the invoice?
a3: Yes, you can set a tax rate percentage and it will be calculated and displayed on the invoice.
q4: Is there a limit on line items?
a4: No, you can add as many line items as needed.
